content.text:
# TimedText:Stone Cold Steve Austin Speech King of The Ring 1997.ogv.en.srt

1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:10,000
The 4th prestigious King of The Ring, Stone Cold Steve Austin and incredible victory!
2
00:00:10,000 --> 00:00:27,000
The first thing I want to be done is to get that piece of crap out of my ring. Don't just get him out of the ring, get him out of the WWF! Because I've proved, son, without a shadow of a doubt, you ain't got what it takes anymore.
3
00:00:27,000 --> 00:00:38,000
You sit there and you thump your Bible, and you say your prayers, and it didnâ€™t get you anywhere. Talk about your psalms, talk about John 3:16...
4
00:00:38,000 --> 00:00:44,000
Austin 3:16 says I just whipped your ass!
5
00:00:44,000 --> 00:00:53,000
All he's gotta do is buy him a cheap bottle of Thunderbird, and try to dig back some of that courage he had in his prime.
6
00:00:53,000 --> 00:01:07,000
As the King of the Ring, I'm serving notice to every one of the WWF Superstars. I don't give a damn what they are; they're all on the list, and that's Stone Cold's list, and I'm fixing to start running through all of them.
7
00:01:07,000 --> 00:01:10,000
Austin pauses, looking around at the crowd, who are now fully on his side.
8
00:01:10,000 --> 00:01:25,000
And as far as this championship match is considered, son, I don't give a damn if it's Davey Boy Smith or Shawn Michaels; Steve Austin's time has come, and when I get the shots, you're looking at the next WWF Champion.
9
00:01:25,000 --> 00:01:29,000
And that's the bottom line, because Stone Cold said so!
10
00:01:29,000 --> 00:01:32,000
